title: Application Crashes after Setting SQL Options
author: therealcode
body_snippet:
## Expected Behavior
After updating mRemoteNG I go into options, check "use SQL Server to load/save connections", test the connection works, then hit OK. The data loads and all connections are available. The period save updates the database each time.

## Current Behavior
This stopped working as of the second to current version (last two versions are broken). Once I hit "Test Connection" for the SQL option - I get a "Connection Successful" response. After I hit "OK" in the options window, it...
